name: Childish Gambino: Auto Oreo
description:
Childish Gambino's Oreos have been stolen! Fight against the perpetrators to retrieve them!

How To Play
-WASD to move
-Move the mouse to aim
-Left click to shoot
-Right click to melee attack

Visit my website for more info, downloads, and a web version.  

http://www.Oditharge.com/Oreo

Additional Remix Tracks
-JoeBro
-Hamburgaga
